alert.note: Alert for Huntington; Wabash (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN WABASH AND SOUTHWESTERN HUNTINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wabash, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Wabash, La Fontaine, Lagro, Mount Etna, Treaty, Banquo, Servia, Lincolnville, and Pleasant Plain. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 272 and 274. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
